Promsocial is the worlds first social network where students can plan, organize and share their prom experience.  To view our explainer video and to pre register now, visit Promsocial.com

I am an investor, a creator, visionary, WordPress site manager, SEM/SEO/Social Media expert and consultant who thinks way outside of the box. I own a diverse domain portfolio and have numerous online partnerships.  I offer consulting to personal projects, online start-ups and small and large size businesses, specializing and focusing on their online goals, social presence, ecomm, traffic, links, keyword ranking and monetization methods and results.  I personally like acquiring brandable/memorable domains, future trend domains, 4/5Letter .com's, geo related domains, as well as product related, exact match domains. My goal as an investor is to not just buy and hold quality domains and wait for an end user to come, rather, I enjoy creating brands, building online properties and portals that earn passive income on a ongoing basis and provide users with quality content. I constantly look to partner up with like-minded individuals who are motivated and share the same passions and work ethic that I bring to the table.  I'm learning and getting involved in the startup space, as of recently.  Regarding domains, I am both a buyer, seller and both short and long term investor.  I focus primarily on direct company and end user sales, as well as building recurring online revenue properties.I look to maximize revenue and improve current processes through search engine optimization, unique and relevant content updated regularly by authority sources and writers, SEO keyword selection and focus, eye catching/vibrant/artistic logos, strong/functional code and creative design, social media, quality backlinking, marketing, affiliate marketing and advertising, PR & event management/promotion and much more.

•Overseeing and executing day-to-day operations of NuSquare, Inc online properties, with a core focus on NewYorkEvents.co & NYFSP.com•Keeping the CEO apprised of significant events and relative industry news •Oversee Communications Director, Content/Social Media Manager, Writers and other key employees relative to operations•Daily updating of the website, including all back-end operations in Wordpress•Creating operations strategy and policies as well as communicating strategy and policy to employees.•Fostering employee alignment with company goals and managing multiple writers

•	Manage a $10 million dollar Structured Finance portfolio of issuers as well as $14 million dollar Sovereign/Latin America portfolio concurrently (transactions including ABS, RMBS, ABCP, CMBS, SQR/OQR, CLO/CDO, Derivatives, Government & Ministry)•	Attend weekly and monthly meetings with Senior Management, AVP/SVP/MD to provide an account of progress made or any outstanding issues with client accounts. •	Handle most of post rating operations and client management including invoice adjustments, fee inquiries, general business questions, outstandings reporting, general accounting and documentation.•	  Liaise with the Cash Applications Department (New York & International) to follow through on allocations of funds to the appropriate issuer account.•	  Maintain accurate details of all communication and account changes (trustee, mergers and acquisitions, bankruptcies/liquidations) with issuers in the Oracle Peoplesoft Financials, Phoenix, Cortera and internal database systems.

Assist with proposal development, implementation and execution of a complete IT relocation for a client.•	 Work on project cost control, process improvement and streamlining the entire relocation start to finish.•	 In charge of client relation, retention, setting and tracking milestones, troubleshooting and project progress.•	 Assume project leadership role, manage a staff of technicians and movers and delegate work as needed.•	 Work directly with the client to ensure  project completion/satisfaction and deliver results on schedule.

•	Provided consultative solutions to personal clients and corporations to meet their training/certification goals•	Assisted and organized DDOS training for government employees to meet training requirements by US law.•	Built a business relationship clients and focused on repeat business, account penetration and networking.•	Serviced numerous Fortune 500 corporate accounts as well as private firms and senior leaders. •	Met and exceeded increasing individual and business sales and revenue goals set forth by management.

•	Performed information technology based sales and consultation to all Michigan State and local government     agencies including schools and law enforcement agencies; sales averaged $1.5 monthly .•	Responsible for all order and account management for multiple accounts and regions.•	Exhibited excellent collaboration skills with fellow team members to meet monthly/quarterly quotas.•	Attended yearly sales conferences and monthly vendor meetings to learn about all new IT products in the     market and surrounding the industry.•	Extended knowledge of major software manufacturers, products and services they offer and befits of each.
Train new employees on in house process, fine dining procedure and etiquette, wine and cuisine knowledge and bar operations.

Managed all daily operations and helped organize various contractors assigned to specific contract jobs and job site duties.Managed a team of 6 with various day to day responsibilities and deadlines based around contracting, scheduling and operational functions.Setup and maintained entire office Microsoft Windows Server network.

Maintained a monthly and quarterly sales quota while continually increasing revenue in multiple locations.Created an extensive training program for new employees, a more efficient point of sale system and creative advertising/marketing techniques that ultimately increased sales for the company each quarter.Recruited, trained and managed new and existing employees for both Central New Jersey and Manhattan district and brought both teams from 10 to 20 employees creating a stronger sales force.

This is my personal recommendation for Masud.  Let me start by saying it was an absolute pleasure to work with Masud.  He is a great manager and a true professional.  Masud is very versatile because he knows his product inside and out and is able to identify a clients need or an opportunity for business.  He is the kind of manager who thrives on his teams success and is constantly there to lend a helping hand and mentor you to success.  Masud is successful now and will be even more successful in the future due to his go getter attitude and his work ethic. It truly was my pleasure to work with Masud, he helped me develop both personally and professionally.  He is a stand up guy in and out of the office and any company would be lucky to have him as a member of their team.  He is a friend and a great guy to know!Regards,Michael J. Hudak
